upgrade.title: Upgrade
upgrade.current_latest_version: Current Version is the latest one
upgrade.caution_desc: This option will keep the list of customized plug-ins only; you can select plug-ins to be installed after you finished upgrading.
upgrade.firmware_large: The uploaded file is too big.
upgrade.platform_unpass: The firmware is inapplicable for the device
upgrade.not_gl: This is not official released firmware
upgrade.old_version: The uploaded firmware version is older than current version.
upgrade.advised_not_keep_setting: Kernal version is upgrading, you are suggested to Not keep settings.
upgrade.unknown_version: This is an unknown version, 3rd-party firmware or the version is older.
